data.title: WMS QVC-Zulily - Lead Consultant
data.description: The WMS stands for Warehouse Management System. It consists of two environments Zulily (corp.zulily.com) and QHX (qvc.zulily.net). The project consisted of various modules based on the operations and the place in the Warehouse this operation performed.
data.shortDescription: Warehouse Management System with micro-frontend architecture for QVC-Zulily operations
features: Working as Lead Consultant, coordinating with the team for technical discussions
Developed backend APIs using Java Spring boot with test cases
Worked on front-end using ReactJs with micro-front-end architecture
Created reusable components and modified existing frameworks
Used Datadog, Kibana for tracing logs and issues
Worked with MySql, Redis, RabbitMQ for backend implementations
data.challenges: Managing micro-frontend architecture and coordinating with multiple teams
data.learnings: Gained expertise in warehouse management systems and micro-frontend patterns

data.title: OVERSIGHT - Senior Software Engineer
data.description:
Oversight's platform works on customers' financial systems to continuously monitor and analyze all spend transactions for fraud, waste, and misuse. With a consolidated, consistent view of risk across their enterprise, customers can prevent financial loss and optimize spend while strengthening the controls that improve compliance.

Company: Xpanxion UST Global
Location: Pune, India
data.shortDescription: Financial monitoring platform that continuously analyzes spend transactions for fraud, waste, and misuse prevention
features: Working as Senior Software Engineer, coordinating with the team for designing Mock-ups, developing Rest APIs
Developed backend APIs using Spring boot, java and testing it using postman integrating it with front end
Analyze requirements, communicate, and resolve issues and assign tasks and monitor the progress of assigned tasks
Coordinate with clients on status, technical discussions, issues and features. perform design, code reviews and enforce related standards
Assist team members in technical issues, mentor team members as they grow in their career
Creating jenkins Jobs, checking for build failure and fixing it, POCs for complex functionality
Worked on different sub projects, like portal, workbench, OCR
data.challenges: Managing multiple sub-projects while ensuring continuous monitoring accuracy and preventing false positives in fraud detection
data.learnings: Gained expertise in financial fraud detection systems, team leadership, and enterprise-level transaction monitoring

data.title: AFS-UPL - Software Engineer
data.description:
The concept of Adarsh Farm Services was conceived by UPL Ltd with the objective of providing best farm mechanization technology and services, leading to a transformation in farming through better efficiency, better yields and building direct relationships with the farming community.

Company: Tudip Technologies
Location: Pune, India
data.shortDescription: Farm mechanization platform ensuring 50% cost saving for farmers and 10-20% yield increase through advanced agricultural technology services
features: Multi-skilling team member responsible for UI design and development with REST API integration
Analysis of real time field issues and providing optimal solutions
Client interaction for technical discussions, problem-solving and feasible solution suggestions
Complete ownership of UI designs and development from scratch
Implemented functional flows, Android app designs and support for web-based and mobile applications
Field visits to different states to interact with BDO, FO and Operators for requirement gathering
Complete design and development of MDM (Master data management) portal
Daily scrum calls, client meetings, project demos, and multi-environment deployments
data.challenges: Managing real-time field issues across different states while ensuring seamless integration between web and mobile platforms for diverse agricultural stakeholders
data.learnings: Gained expertise in agricultural technology solutions, Google Earth Engine integration, and cross-platform development for farming communities

data.title: Speak 'N Cook
data.description:
A voice-controlled cooking assistant app that helps users search and cook recipes through voice commands step by step. Features dual roles for Admin and End Users.

Company: Tudip Technologies
Location: Pune, India
data.shortDescription: Voice-controlled cooking assistant app enabling hands-free recipe cooking with voice commands like Read, Next, Pause, Resume, and Repeat
features: Implemented voice command functionality using React Native packages for recipe step navigation
Developed recipe management system with image upload capabilities for both users and admins
Created admin portal for recipe moderation, user management, and analytics
Built cuisine management system with detailed descriptions
Integrated iOS app store deployment pipeline
Voice commands: Read, Next, Pause, Resume, and Repeat functionality
Dual role system for Admin and End Users
data.challenges: Implementing accurate voice recognition in kitchen environments with background noise and ensuring seamless hands-free navigation
data.learnings: Gained expertise in voice recognition technology, React Native development, and iOS app store deployment processes

data.title: Geo-Localization - Intern Software Engineer
data.description:
The Geo-Localization project is created to keep the track of ships moving across the globe. It includes tracking the locations of ships showing its details. The ArcGIS server is used to keep the data for locations like longitude, latitude and some other details.

Company: MAN Diesel & Turbo India Pvt.Ltd.
Location: Aurangabad, India
data.shortDescription: Ship tracking system using Google Maps SDK and ArcGIS server to monitor global vessel movements with advanced filtering capabilities
features: Global ship tracking system to monitor vessel movements across the globe
ArcGIS server integration for storing location data including longitude, latitude and vessel details
Responsive UI development using Bootstrap, HTML, CSS and media queries
Google Maps SDK implementation for real-time ship location visualization
Advanced filtering system based on Ship Type, Date, and Engine Capacity
Real-time location tracking with detailed ship information display
Geographic data management and visualization capabilities
data.challenges: Integrating ArcGIS server with Google Maps API while ensuring real-time tracking accuracy and implementing complex filtering mechanisms for large datasets
data.learnings: Gained expertise in GIS technologies, real-time tracking systems, Google Maps API integration, and maritime industry requirements

data.title: npm Enterprise
data.description:
A private npm registry solution enabling large teams to share, discover, and reuse code behind corporate firewalls. Built on the same codebase that powers the public npm registry.

Company: Tudip Technologies
Location: Pune, India
data.shortDescription: Enterprise-grade private npm registry with authentication, private module sharing, and streamlined development workflows for large organizations
features: Developed Docker-based deployment architecture for npmE appliance
Implemented various authentication methods for enterprise security
Created internal sharing system for private modules
Built development and deployment workflow controls
Enhanced code discovery and sharing capabilities within organizations
Enterprise authentication integration
Private module management
Corporate firewall compatibility
Docker containers with Replicated orchestration
data.challenges: Ensuring enterprise-level security while maintaining npm registry performance and implementing seamless authentication across different corporate systems
data.learnings: Gained expertise in enterprise software architecture, Docker containerization, private registry management, and corporate security requirements
